description: This source file implements platform-dependent and general utility functions for a Web Resource Locator object, specifically the function WebCreateResourceLocator which creates and returns a new resource locator object instance.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE WebCreateResourceLocator(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates a new Web Resource Locator object using the WebRloCreate function, taking context handles for container, owner, and reserved contexts as arguments.
